name: Snake Classic - Snake Challenge
description:
Snake Classic - Snake Challenge
snake game- Return to childhood with classic game, super interesting and addictive


Snake Classic - Snake Challenge
snake game- Welcome to World Childhood . The game gives you the feeling of fun and nostalgia
The game was so familiar to you worldwide. However it is never tedious and bored

How to play :
- Use the arrow button in game to control the Snake
- Smart and dexterity control to eat black apples more as possible
- Wish you eating apple to highScore game
- Avoid crashing into wall else snake will die
Good luck !!!

Features :
Return to childhood with classic game, super interesting and addictive
- The graphics are realistic and the sound effects are hair-raising
- Nice graphics and real sound
- Interesting play game
- Gain your high score by eat many black apples
- Let's quick control and Smart and dexterity control to have highScore
